1.content:
Wearily, you opened your eyes.

You were waking up, despite having no memory of going to bed. You recalled finding a ring while you were cleaning your apartment. The ring had the words, 'Make a wish' engraved on the inside of the ring. On a playful whim while holding it, you had said, "I wish for my heart's desire." There had been a flash of light and then.... Nothing until you woke up.

The moment you heard the door knock, you fully awoke. And a that moment you took in your surroundings.

The room you were in had all your stuff in it, but the room itself was quite big.

"We're coming in, master!" A voice cheerfully said before five people from your favorite anime and/or manga came in while dressed as maids.

Who were the maids?

155.title: free choice

1553.content: Are the five maids from the anime/manga Sekirei? Or are they perhaps from the anime/manga Akame ga Kill?
1553.title: More maid collections

15531.content: Are the five Sekirei maids Musubi, Matsu, Tsukiumi, Kazehana, and Uzume?
15531.title: Sekirei maids

choices: All five of them were looking a bit pudgy.
All five of them looked a bit swollen in the chest and belly.
155311.content:
You quickly recognized the five women before you as from the anime and manga Sekirei, all of them bowing their heads towards you. All of them are dressed in versions of clothing reminiscent of the classic French maid outfit – mostly black and white with lacy frills – but definitely more towards the sexy and quite revealing side, and each with their own unique touches similar to their original outfits.

The brown haired Musubi was wearing an outfit that mixed the French maid with a karate gi, the loose sleeves hanging from her arms and decorated with some red string. Red headed Matsu had her glasses perched upon her nose, while she was clad in a long flowing version exposing nearly an entire leg and much of her cleavage. The long blond curls of Tsukiumi cascaded around something resembling her own maid outfit but this one left her much more scantily clad. Kazehana had let down her purple hair, and her body was barely contained by a maid outfit that had small fabric straps holding the front together. Finally, Uzume still had her side tail of dark brown hair, and was wearing a minimalist outfit consisting of a cross of the material looping down from her neck, around her breasts, and connecting across her back, while also wearing a short skirt that barely preserved her modesty.

All five of them remained with their heads bowed silently as your eyes roamed their bodies. Was this related to that ring you found, and the wish you made? You certainly enjoyed the anime, especially these five women, so it certainly seemed likely that your wish had somehow caused this. As your gaze lingered on each of them in turn, you noticed that all of them were somewhat more different from their appearance you remembered.
155311.title: Meeting your new staff

choices: All five of them looked like they were expanded in a combination of ways.
All five of them looked a bit swollen across their whole body.
All five of them looked different in yet another way.
1553113.content: As you continued to observe them and compare them to how you remember, you narrowed down what was different.
1553113.title: Your altered staff

choices: All five of them looked pudgier and more maternal.
All five of them looked pudgier and inflated across their bodies.
All five of them were under another combination.
15531131.content: You now realize that all five of the women seemed to be under a combination of effects.
15531131.title: The combined alterations

choices: You decided to have some fun with your maids first.
Before you could do anything else, you were interrupted.
155311311.content:
It finally came to you, each of them looked a bit fatter, but they also had a certain glow about them and their stomachs and breasts seemed a bit swollen, almost as if they were pregnant too. You had always thought that each of them could stand to put on some weight, and the thought of them being pregnant was an excellent bonus.

Finally finding your voice, you managed to say “Did one of you say ‘master’?” hoping that your confusion wasn’t too evident in your speech.

All five of them looked up at you and then back and forth between themselves, concern darkening their faces.

Musubi spoke up, “I did, master. Are you feeling all right, if I may ask?” bowing her head again as she asked that.

“I’m feeling well enough, I just have very little idea what’s going on.”

Another troubled glance passed between the five ladies, before Kazehana chimed in, looking a bit guilty, “We worried this might happen.” Her face turned even more guilty looking, “It’s all my fault, master!” she suddenly exclaimed, tears starting to form in her eyes and bowing her head even lower.

You tried to ignore that her current position was giving you a wonderful view of her ample cleavage, but fail rather spectacularly, an erection starting to tent your pants.

“Just explain what happened,” you responded, now trying to divert attention.

“Of course, master,” she said, her voice quivering slightly. “Yesterday, I was cleaning the sitting room, and I accidently swept a vase off of one of the shelves, and it dropped right on your head. Please forgive me,” she begged, seemingly almost sobbing as she said that.

Matsu placed a hand on Kazehana’s shoulder, before adding, “I examined you to the best of my abilities, and knew that you would be fine, but thought there might be the possibility of memory loss. I just didn’t expect it to be quite so bad. You…really don’t remember any of this?” motioning towards the five of them and around the room.

Not wanting to chance dispelling all of this, you decided not to mention the ring and your wish, and instead went along with it, shaking your head no. Suddenly, you were buried in the yielding flesh of the women, as they rushed you, holding you tight and fretting over your memory loss. Through the gaps between their bodies, you saw that Kazehana hadn’t rushed to you yet, instead remaining where she was with the same guilty look on her face. Seeing this, you gave a sharp whistle and motioned for her to come over as well. Upon seeing this, she bowed her head rapidly before dashing to join in the pile surrounding you. You hugged and gave a kiss to each of them, lingering a bit longer with Kazehana which she seemed to enjoy, thinking that you could get very used to this.
155311311.title: Your plump and gravid maids

1553323.content: How about Heaven's Lost Property: Ikaros, Nymph, Astrea, Sohara Mitsuki and Mikako Satsukitane?
1553323.title: Next

info.brief_description: From a ring you found, you gain a mansion and five maids....
info.description:
One day while you were cleaning out your apartment, you found some old ring that had the words, "Make a wish" inscribed on the inside. While holding it, you said, "I wish for my heart's desire."
All of a sudden you got dizzy and passed out. when you came to, you were in a mansion that now belonged to you.
There is a limit of five maids (both minimum and maximum) and they only can be from Anime or Manga. After much thought and being unable to contact the one who asked me to make this story, I'll allow western cartoons, as they've steadily been borrowing more and more from Japanese animation since the 80's or so.

What's allowed -

Body expansion
inflation
Weight gain
Pregnancy (if it's because of Unbirth, go easy on the description)
Sex (please lead up to it.)

What's not allowed -

Scat
graphic violence
Ending chapters
